name: The Beanstalk (itch)
description:
Plot/Premise:

The Beanstalk re-tells the tale of Jack and the Beanstalk and Jack and Jill with a fantasy rpg spin. Help Jack climb the Beanstalk by battling bean and cloud monsters and use collected beans to grow the beanstalk further in a turn based rpg.

Notable Features

  • Turn based battles where you must carefully manage finite amounts of CP to execute available skills
  • Apply harmful states to enemies by using attack, manage this with your skills to open the enemy up for more punishment from your skills
  • Skills are provided by equipped weapons and off-hand items. Adjust equipment to alter your strategy or suite the characters to your play style
  • Utilize Adrenaline in a pinch to fully recover or to add a protective buff
  • No game overs from regular encounters, try again if you lose a battle
  • Two different ending paths based on your interactions with Jill which are made while climbing the Beanstalk
  • Cloud Stages take inspiration from retro platformer games in terms of layout
  • Listen to nostalgic sound effects and music as you explore and advance in the game
  • A lighthearted story with tender moments and humor
Demo Available here:http://www.mediafire.com/download/ghhbxs783aol5eo/...
